languages.text: "О! Бесстрашная, могучая, с сердцем холодным словно камень! Достойная соперница, не чета убогим ксеносам и смердящим еретикам! Сразить тебя будет славно!" {n}Ульфар приветствует убийцу Калькасара самой доброй улыбкой, что вы когда-либо видели на его лице.{/n}

"Ah! Fearless, mighty, with a heart as cold as stone! A worthy opponent, a far cry from wretched xenos and stinking heretics! It will be glorious to slay you!" {n}Ulfar greets Calcazar's assassin with the softest smile you have ever seen on his face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "О! Бесстрашная, могучая, с сердцем холодным словно камень! Достойная соперница, не чета убогим ксеносам и смердящим еретикам! Сразить тебя будет славно!" {n}Ульфар приветствует убийцу Калькасара самой доброй улыбкой, что вы когда-либо видели на его лице.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah! Fearless, mighty, with a heart as cold as stone! A worthy opponent, a far cry from wretched xenos and stinking heretics! It will be glorious to slay you!" {n}Ulfar greets Calcazar's assassin with the softest smile you have ever seen on his face.{/n}

"Ah! Fearless, mighty, with a heart as cold as stone! A worthy opponent, a far cry from wretched xenos and stinking heretics! It will be glorious to slay you!" {n}Ulfar greets Calcazar's assassin with the softest smile you have ever seen on his face.{/n}

"Ah! Fearless, mighty, with a heart as cold as stone! A worthy opponent, a far cry from wretched xenos and stinking heretics! It will be glorious to slay you!" {n}Ulfar greets Calcazar's assassin with the softest smile you have ever seen on his face.{/n}

"Ah! Fearless, mighty, with a heart as cold as stone! A worthy opponent, a far cry from wretched xenos and stinking heretics! It will be glorious to slay you!" {n}Ulfar greets Calcazar's assassin with the softest smile you have ever seen on his face.{/n}

languages.text: 「ああ！恐れ知らずにして強大、石のごとく冷たき心だ！好敵手よ、お前は卑劣な異種族とも、鼻が曲がりそうな異端者とも大違いだ！殺せば武勲に輝くだろうな！」{n}ウルファーは、これまでに見せてきたどんな笑みより優しく、カルカサルのアサシンにあいさつする。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah! Fearless, mighty, with a heart as cold as stone! A worthy opponent, a far cry from wretched xenos and stinking heretics! It will be glorious to slay you!" {n}Ulfar greets Calcazar's assassin with the softest smile you have ever seen on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ああ！恐れ知らずにして強大、石のごとく冷たき心だ！好敵手よ、お前は卑劣な異種族とも、鼻が曲がりそうな異端者とも大違いだ！殺せば武勲に輝くだろうな！」{n}ウルファーは、これまでに見せてきたどんな笑みより優しく、カルカサルのアサシンにあいさつする。{/n}

languages.text: “啊！英勇、强大、心如磐石！相比卑鄙的异形与邪恶的异端，你真是位可敬的对手！亲手杀死你会是我的光荣！”{n}乌尔法以你从未见过的和善微笑，面对着卡尔卡扎派来的刺客。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah! Fearless, mighty, with a heart as cold as stone! A worthy opponent, a far cry from wretched xenos and stinking heretics! It will be glorious to slay you!" {n}Ulfar greets Calcazar's assassin with the softest smile you have ever seen on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “啊！英勇、强大、心如磐石！相比卑鄙的异形与恶臭的异端，你真是位可敬的对手！亲手杀死你会是我的光荣！”{n}乌尔法以你从未见过的和善微笑，面对着卡尔卡扎的派来的刺客。{/n}

languages.text: « Ah ! Intrépide, vaillante, avec un cœur de pierre ! Une adversaire digne de ce nom, pour changer de ces misérables xénos et de ces répugnants hérétiques ! Qu'il sera glorieux de vous terrasser ! » {n}Ulfar salue l'assassin de Calcazar avec le sourire le plus doux que vous ayez jamais vu sur son visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah! Fearless, mighty, with a heart as cold as stone! A worthy opponent, a far cry from wretched xenos and stinking heretics! It will be glorious to slay you!" {n}Ulfar greets Calcazar's assassin with the softest smile you have ever seen on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ah ! Intrépide, vaillante, avec un cœur de pierre ! Une adversaire digne de ce nom, pour changer de ces misérables xénos et de ces répugnants hérétiques ! Qu'il sera glorieux de vous terrasser ! » {n}Ulfar salue l'assassin de Calcazar avec le sourire le plus doux que vous ayez jamais vu sur son visage.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Ah! ¡Intrépida, implacable y con el corazón frío como el hielo! ¡Una adversaria digna, nada que ver con esos xenos miserables y esos herejes asquerosos! ¡Será un placer acabar contigo!». {n}Ulfar saluda a la asesina de Calcazar con la sonrisa más delicada que jamás le hayas visto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah! Fearless, mighty, with a heart as cold as stone! A worthy opponent, a far cry from wretched xenos and stinking heretics! It will be glorious to slay you!" {n}Ulfar greets Calcazar's assassin with the softest smile you have ever seen on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Ah! ¡Intrépida, implacable y con el corazón frío como el hielo! ¡Una adversaria digna, nada que ver con esos xenos miserables y esos herejes asquerosos! ¡Será un placer acabar contigo!». {n}Ulfar saluda a la asesina de Calcazar con la sonrisa más delicada que jamás le hayas visto.{/n}

languages.text: "Ah! Furchtlos, mächtig, mit einem kalten Herz aus Stein! Ein würdiger Gegner, ein ferner Ruf verfluchter Xenos und stinkender Ketzer! Es wird ruhmreich sein, Euch zu fällen!" {n}Ulfar begrüßt Calcazars Assassinen mit dem freundlichsten Lächeln, das du je auf seinem Gesicht gesehen hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah! Fearless, mighty, with a heart as cold as stone! A worthy opponent, a far cry from wretched xenos and stinking heretics! It will be glorious to slay you!" {n}Ulfar greets Calcazar's assassin with the softest smile you have ever seen on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah! Furchtlos, mächtig, mit einem kalten Herz aus Stein! Ein würdiger Gegner, ein ferner Ruf verfluchter Xenos und stinkender Ketzer! Es wird ruhmreich sein, Euch zu fällen!" {n}Ulfar begrüßt Calcazars Assassinen mit dem freundlichsten Lächeln, das du je auf seinem Gesicht gesehen hast.{/n}

languages.text: "Ha! Korkusuz, heybetli, kalbi de taş gibi! Adi zenolarla ve kokuşmuş kâfirlerle alakası bile yok, tam dişime göre bir rakip! Seni katletmenin şanını tadacağım!" {n}Ulfar, Calcazar'ın suikastçısını oldukça yumuşak bir tebessümle karşılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah! Fearless, mighty, with a heart as cold as stone! A worthy opponent, a far cry from wretched xenos and stinking heretics! It will be glorious to slay you!" {n}Ulfar greets Calcazar's assassin with the softest smile you have ever seen on his face.{/n}
